articles.title: Canada's first-dose vaccinations surpass U.S., as American daily rate declines - CTV News
articles.description: The U.S. is still far ahead of Canada when it comes to people who are fully vaccinated against COVID-19. But its vaccination rate has slowed considerably, while Canada has now surpassed America when it comes to one-dose vaccines per capita.
articles.content:
TORONTO --
